resources.string: Reduce waste by being mindful of consumption habits, choosing minimal packaging, reusable water bottles, and turning off electronics.\n
Reuse items instead of discarding them by finding new ways to use them, like textile napkins, donating items to charity, using reusable shopping bags.\n
"Recycle by converting waste materials into new products instead of throwing them away. Recyclable items include aluminum cans, glass bottles, plastic containers, and paper products. "
